thread.title: BRIEF-China Industrial Securities International Financial Group Posts‍ FY Profit Of HK$152.8 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-China Industrial Securities International Financial Group Posts‍ FY Profit Of HK$152.8 Mln

organizations.name: china industrial securities international financial group ltd
brief-china industrial securities international financial group posts‍ fy

text:
March 7 (Reuters) - China Industrial Securities International Financial Group Ltd:
* ‍FY REVENUE HK$927.7 MILLION VERSUS HK$507.3 MILLION * ‍BOARD RECOMMENDED PAYMENT OF A FINAL DIVIDEND OF HK$0.03 PER SHARE​
* PROFIT FOR YEAR HK$152.8 MILLION VERSUS HK$ 101.1 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
